member.summary: Dictionary for counting how often a key occured.

member.name: T:PiStellwerk.Util.DictionaryIncrementExtension
member.summary: Extension methods for dictionaries with numeric values. The value is increased by 1, if no K/V Pair exists yet, a new one is created.
